Definition at line 64 of file ExtractorFactory.cpp.

Extractor * Aquila::ExtractorFactory::getExtractor ( const std::string &  featureType,
unsigned int  frameLength,
unsigned int  paramsPerFrame = 1 
) [static]

Returns an extractor object according to parameters.

Supported types: MFCC, Energy, Power.

Feature objects are created on heap and must by deleted by caller!

Parameters:
featureType feature type
frameLength frame length in milliseconds
paramsPerFrame number of features computed for each frame
Exceptions:
Aquila::Exception for an undefined feature type
Returns:
pointer to object of one of Extractor-derived classes
